text:
Wendy Hughes (29 July 1952 – 8 March 2014) was an Australian actress. She worked mostly in television and theatre. Hughes' career began in the mid-1970s. She also appeared in movies. Some of which includes "Newsfront", "Kostas", "My Brilliant Career", "Lucinda Brayford", and "Touch and Go".
Hughes died in Sydney from cancer, aged 61.
